MonsterTrait.Name: Cunning Action
MonsterTrait.Text: On each of his turns, Narth can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

MonsterTrait.Name: Roleplaying Information
MonsterTrait.Text:
Narth sells gear to adventurers, and he also has an adventurous spirit. The Lionshield Coster pays him well, but he longs to make a name for himself. At the same time, he runsa a business with his partner Alaestra and knows she wouldn't forgive him if he ran off and never returned.
Ideal: "The bigger the risk, the greater the reward." Bond: "I adore my colleague Alestra, and I'd like to do something to impress her." Flaw: "I'll risk life and limb to become a legend.-"

MonsterAction.Name: Shortsword
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Hand Crossbow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage. Narth carries twenty crossbow bolts.
